name: Repel Boarders
description:
Turn based game that currently must be played on the same computer as your opponent.

Touch or click the Blue, Red, and Green boxes to move your units and attack.

Clicking or touching a unit you have selected but not moved allows you to deselect that unit.

Drunk AI now available.

Added some menu screens and an instruction screen.

Added an attack animation to clarify when an attack happened

Added a view screen so you can see enemy units
